title: Crypto venture funding drops 59% to $1.9 billion in Q2, later-stage deals dominate
summary: Crypto venture funding declined 59% quarter-over-quarter to $1.976 billion in the second quarter across 378 deals. According to a Galaxy report, last quarter was the second-smallest investment quarter since the fourth quarter of 2020.
